experience.title: Frontend Engineer
info: Developed and maintained dynamic, user-friendly web interfaces for e-commerce websites using VTEX technology.
Implemented responsive designs, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimal performance.
Collaborated closely with design and backend teams to create seamless and visually appealing user experiences.
Contributed to the success of e-commerce projects, driving online business growth through frontend expertise.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
info: Developed and maintained dynamic, user-friendly web interfaces for e-commerce websites using VTEX technology.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer
info: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain responsive web applications and user interfaces.
Translated design mockups and wireframes into high-quality, pixel-perfect frontend code.
Implemented modern web technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and popular JavaScript libraries/frameworks.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized web applications for speed and performance.
Conducted code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to maintain code quality and reliability.
Actively participated in project planning, providing technical insights and recommendations.

experience.title: Web Developer
info: Assisted in the development and testing of chatbot applications and AI-powered solutions.
Worked closely with senior developers to implement features and functionalities.
Assisted in the creation of documentation, user guides, and knowledge base articles.
Participated in team meetings and brainstorming sessions to contribute ideas and insights.
Collaborated with the support team to troubleshoot and resolve user issues.
